Abstracts#

The following is a list of abstract classes that are used to define the interface for all models.

class abcmodel.abstracts.AbstractState(*args: Any, **kwargs: Any)[source]#

Bases: Pytree

Abstract state class to define the interface for all states.

class abcmodel.abstracts.AbstractRadiationState(*args: Any, **kwargs: Any)[source]#

Bases: AbstractState

Abstract rad state.

net_rad: Array#

Net surface rad [W m-2].

in_srad: Array#

Incoming solar rad [W m-2].

out_srad: Array#

Outgoing solar rad [W m-2].

in_lrad: Array#

Incoming longwave rad [W m-2].

out_lrad: Array#

Outgoing longwave rad [W m-2].

class abcmodel.abstracts.AbstractLandState(*args: Any, **kwargs: Any)[source]#

Bases: AbstractState

Abstract land state.

alpha: Array#

surface albedo [-], range 0 to 1.

surf_temp: Array#

Surface temperature [K].

rs: Array#

Surface resistance [s m-1].

wg: Array#

No moisture content in the root zone [m3 m-3].

wl: Array#

No water content in the canopy [m].

esat: Array#

Saturation vapor pressure [Pa].

qsat: Array#

Saturation specific humidity [kg/kg].

dqsatdT: Array#

Derivative of saturation specific humidity with respect to temperature [kg/kg/K].

e: Array#

Vapor pressure [Pa].

qsatsurf: Array#

Saturation specific humidity at surface temperature [kg/kg].

wtheta: Array#

Kinematic heat flux [K m/s].

wq: Array#

Kinematic moisture flux [kg/kg m/s].

wCO2: Array#

Kinematic CO2 flux [kg/kg m/s] or [mol m-2 s-1].

class abcmodel.abstracts.AbstractAtmosphereState(*args: Any, **kwargs: Any)[source]#

Bases: AbstractState

Abstract atmos state.

class abcmodel.abstracts.AbstractCoupledState(*args: Any, **kwargs: Any)[source]#

Bases: AbstractState, Generic[RadT, LandT, AtmosT]

Abstract coupled state, generic over rad, land and atmos types.

rad: TypeVar(RadT, bound= AbstractRadiationState)#
land: TypeVar(LandT, bound= AbstractLandState)#
atmos: TypeVar(AtmosT, bound= AbstractAtmosphereState)#
total_water_mass: Array#
property net_rad: Array#

Net surface rad [W m-2].

property in_srad: Array#

Incoming shortwave rad [W m-2].

class abcmodel.abstracts.AbstractModel[source]#

Bases: object

Abstract model class to define the interface for all models.

class abcmodel.abstracts.AbstractRadiationModel[source]#

Bases: AbstractModel, Generic[RadT]

Abstract radiation model class to define the interface for all rad models.

tstart: Array#

Start time of the model.

abstractmethod run(state, t, dt, const)[source]#
class abcmodel.abstracts.AbstractLandModel[source]#

Bases: AbstractModel, Generic[LandT]

Abstract land model class to define the interface for all land models.

abstractmethod run(state, const)[source]#
abstractmethod integrate(state, dt)[source]#
class abcmodel.abstracts.AbstractAtmosphereModel[source]#

Bases: AbstractModel, Generic[AtmosT]

Abstract atmos model class to define the interface for all atmos models.

abstractmethod warmup(radmodel, landmodel, state, t, dt, const)[source]#
abstractmethod run(state, const)[source]#
abstractmethod statistics(state, t, const)[source]#
abstractmethod integrate(state, dt)[source]#
